Downtown Southside Inbound

Description:

The Downtown Southside Inbound leaves the University Downtown Center and travels through Henry & Water Streets in Downtown Binghamton, and Vestal Pkwy, Conklin Avenue, & Tompkins Street in Southside Binghamton, while also making stops at the BC Junction Bus Terminal and Mirabito Stadium enroute back to campus.

Operation Time:

Weekdays:
7:55 A.M. to 9:10 P.M. (Fridays) or 10:10 P.M. (Monday-Thursdays)


Weekends:
11:05 A.M. to 8:25 P.M.

Notes:

Scroll below for a graphic map of the Downtown Southside Inbound, its schedule, and the stops along its route.

① Leaves the University Downtown Center

② BC Junction

③ Tompkins St & Conklin Av

④ Conklin Ave & S. Washington St

⑤ Arrives at the University Union


M-T = Only operates Monday-Thursdays.

AA= Does NOT service Academic A Monday-Thursdays.
